summary: A more realistic harvesting for flora and ingredients and death items on animals.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.garytymon.com/images/Better_Harvesting.jpg[/img]

[color=#ffd966][size=3]MORE REALISTIC RANDOM HARVESTING OF FLORA and DEAD ANIMALS
NO SCRIPTS
COVERS MAIN GAME AND ALL 3 DLC
INCLUDES ALL LATEST USLEEP CHANGES
WORKS WITH WISEMAN'S FLORA FIXES or FLORA RESPAWN FIX.[/size][/color]

[size=3]This is a mod that changes the harvesting in Skyrim for flora and ingredients and items you find on dead animals/creatures. No more will you just harvest 1 flower or pick up 1 mushroom, or 1 snowberry when harvesting flora, or harvest 1 mammoth tusk from a mammoth, or 1 sabre cat tooth from a sabre cat, or 1 hagraven feather from a hagraven---you will instead get a realistic random amount that reflects what you are harvesting. I have gone round all the flora, ingredients etc you harvest from plants or dead animals in the base game and DLC and based on my judgement picked a realistic amount you could randomly harvest taking into account what you harvest, the item harvested, and the size of the thing you're harvesting. So don't worry you won't get 3 sabre cat eyes, or 5 goat legs, just an amount that I think is more realistic and not too much that it makes harvesting overpowered.... you still have to harvest but not quite as much now.

For example, in the vanilla game harvesting a small blue flower bush would give you 1 blue flower, now you will get a random amount between 1-5 flowers, a larger blue flower bush giving you between 3-10. Harvesting a dead mudcrab gives you a random amount between 1-3 mudcrab legs and 1-2 claws, rather than just the 1 in vanilla, and so on.
[/size]
[size=3]This mod also removes finding gold coins, necklaces, rings, gems etc on dead animals. I never liked this feature in the game when I killed a deer or a mudcrab i would find 10 gold coins or a silver necklace. So no more of that rubbish, just meat, fur, and whatever else the animal contains. [/size][color=#ff7700][size=2][i]*edit - by request I have added optional versions where animals still drop loot and valuables.[/i][/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00]Q. What's different about this mod to all the other harvesting mods.[/color]

[size=3]There's a few harvesting mods out there that do pretty much the same as this, but most are not up to date with USLEEP changes, or they contain scripts or don't cover all the flora in all the DLC. Also this mod is compatible and works alongside Wiseman's Flora Fixes and Flora Respawn Fix (both of those mods fix a bug in the game where flora doesn't respawn so go get one of those if you haven't already). This mod contains all the changes from the latest version of USLEEP but doesn't require USLEEP, but i highly recommend getting USLEEP as its pretty much essential to any playthrough. Also, it doesn't add any other flora or ingredients to the game, keeps it nice and simple and just changes what was in the base game and all 3 dlc. If you want added meats or plants or ingredients and loads more then something like Complete Alchemy and Cooking Overhaul would be better suited.[/size]

[color=#00ff00]Q. What dlc or mods does this require.[/color]

[size=3]It requires all 3 DLC, Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn. You don't need Wiseman's Flora Fixes OR Flora Respawn Fix to use this, but there are 3 main files to download, 1 is for if you don't use those 2 mods (so just the 3 dlc required), 1 is for Wiseman's Flora Fixes (required) and the other for Flora Respawn Fix (required). Use ONLY 1 of those.[/size]

[color=#00ff00]Q. Load order[/color]

[size=3]Place it after Wiseman's Flora Fixes or Flora Respawn Fix or any mod that alters the flora, ingredients or death items on animals/creatures (it alters the levelled lists for death items on animals and a few other levelled lists like amount of gold found in coin purses).[/size]

[color=#ff7700]Happy harvesting![/color]

[size=3]If there is any amounts you feel are wrong or need changing or tweaked please let me know.[/size][/center]
author: grazman

files.name: Better Harvesting - Animal Loot version
files.changelogHtml:
3 changes to Raw Boar Meat, Raw Hopper Legs and Raw Hopper Meat inline with latest USLEEP 3.0.8
Changed death item on a Spriggen. Spiggens will now only drop 1 taproot, as the taproot is the stomach or heart area so will only be 1 available. Spriggen sap remains unchanged.
